wordGroup: attract foreign investment 吸引外商投资；对外招商
attract investment 招商，招商引资

sentences.en: The Cardiff Bay project is attracting many visitors.
sentences.cn: 加的夫湾工程吸引着众多的参观者。

sentences.en: His speech emphasized the importance of attracting industry to the town.
sentences.cn: 他的发言强调了吸引工业到城镇的重要性。

sentences.en: Several companies are offering new, entry-level models in hopes of attracting more buyers.
sentences.cn: 数家公司正提供初级入门新款，希望吸引更多买家。
